channel.title: Odd pc behaviour
channel.description:
Well, when trying to install a game as AA or Rappelz my pc starts to act funny. Those installers, like any other installer on vista need admin privileges. But I don't get a popup while installing it, so it cancels the installation because it can't access files. So I run the installer as admin (right click) but then all I get is the vista version of the sand glass, and it stays like that all the time. I can move the mouse, but I can't use windows explorer anymore unless I close it via task manager. When I put the installer on my desktop, the same happens but then I can't use my desktop anymore. The only way to somehow get it back working is clicking on that desktop button next to start. When I shut my pc down, it stays at the "shutting down windows" screen. What is wrong?
Thanks in advance.
Edit: Fixt! Disabling UAC did the job.

item.title: Odd pc behaviour
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Well, when trying to install a game as AA or Rappelz my pc starts to act funny. Those installers, like any other installer on vista need admin privileges. But I don’t get a popup while installing it, so it cancels the installation because it can’t access files. So I run the installer as admin (right click) but then all I get is the vista version of the sand glass, and it stays like that all the time. I can move the mouse, but I can’t use windows explorer anymore unless I close it via task manager. When I put the installer on my desktop, the same happens but then I can’t use my desktop anymore. The only way to somehow get it back working is clicking on that desktop button next to start. When I shut my pc down, it stays at the “shutting down windows” screen. What is wrong?

Thanks in advance.

Edit: Fixt! Disabling UAC did the job.
